name: 楊侑倫
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意
本課程介紹如何應用數值分析理論求解工程問題。
1. 數值方法基本觀念及其領域
2. 數值方法之誤差及穩定性
3. 非線性代數方程式之數值解法
4. 聯立代數方程式之數值解法
5. 矩陣特徵值求法
6. 非線性聯立方程式之數值解法
7. 多項式插值法及曲線配湊
8. 數值微分與積分
9. 常微分方程式之數值解法
10. 偏微分方程式之數值解法
To introduce  the numerical analysis techniques for solving engineering problems.
1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the numerical analysis
2. The errors and stability of the numerical methods
3. Numerical methods of solving nonlinear algebraic equations
4. Numerical methods of solving systems of linear equations.
5. Algebraic eigen-value problems
6. Numerical methods of solving systems of nonlinear equations
7. Numerical interpolation and curve fitting
8. Numerical differentiation and integration
9. Numerical solution of ordinary differential equations
10. Numerical solution of partial differential equation
